EmptyScreen.title: Google Analytics E-commerce Optimization Assistant
EmptyScreen.description: I'm here to help you analyze your GA data and boost your e-commerce conversions. Start a conversation or try these examples:

messages.conversionRates: My e-commerce site has low conversion rates. Sessions are up 10% but purchases are down. Can you help me identify the issue?
messages.cartAbandonment: I'm seeing high cart abandonment rates in my Google Analytics. What optimizations can I implement to improve this?
messages.trafficSources: Which traffic sources are performing best for my e-commerce conversions, and how can I optimize underperforming channels?

GA4OnboardingDialog.title: Pick your Google Analytics project
GA4OnboardingDialog.description: Pick the project you want the agent to help you with. You can adjust your choice later.

connectionExpired.title: Google Analytics Not Connected
connectionExpired.body: Your Google Analytics is not connected. Please connect to continue.
connectionExpired.finePrint: Your selected property and settings will be preserved.

missingPermissions.title: Reconnect Google Analytics to continue
missingPermissions.body: Your Google session has expired or the app doesn't have permission to read your Analytics data. Please reconnect to grant read‑only access so we can fetch your GA4 properties and deliver insights to grow your store. You can disconnect anytime.
missingPermissions.finePrint: We only request read‑only access to Google Analytics. We never edit or delete your data.

apiNotEnabled.title: Enable Google Analytics APIs to continue
apiNotEnabled.body: Your Google Cloud project doesn't have the required APIs enabled. Enable the Admin and Data APIs so we can read your GA4 properties and deliver insights to grow your store.
apiNotEnabled.finePrint: You will be redirected to Google Cloud Console to enable APIs for your project.

not_connected.title: Unlock powerful insights to grow your business

expired.title: Unlock powerful insights to grow your business

disconnect.confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Google account? You'll need to reconnect to use GA4 features.

ChatPage.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to view this chat
